alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 11:38AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette, Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 100 PM EST... At 1138 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Live Oak to 9 miles west of Mayo to 15 miles southeast of Perry to 26 miles northwest of Steinhatchee. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Cross City, Steinhatchee, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Tennille, Shamrock, Jug Island, Clara, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Buckville, Dekle Beach, Jonesboro, Jack Lee Island, Grady, Hatch Bend and Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
